amendment.description: To provide support regarding the rural development crisis in Mexico.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1164 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 43. Record Vote Number: 268.

action.text: Amendment SA 1164 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9166-9169, S9180-9181; text: CR S9166) To provide support regarding the rural development crisis in Mexico.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1164 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 1136.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1164 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 43. Record Vote Number: 268.
